name: Five Cent Hotel
description:
A game I made in 24 hours for a the 2022 WinterMelon Jam. My first officially completed game (discounting tutorials.) The theme was COZY. This was my interpretation.

I don't know what genre this game is.

Armed with a flamethrower, you must keep your tenants warm and COZY through the blizzard. Also, there are ghosts.  And there's 10 levels I think. I don't remember.

WASD to move. The rest of the controls are explained in-game.

Music by DJ Ugly. (I slowed it down a bunch, he's probably going to be pissed. If you're reading this, no offence man. It's aesthetic. Here's what his music sounds like at a normal speed: https://soundcloud.com/indian-cthulhu)

Footnote: I spelt 'recommend' wrong twice. Oh well. Too late to change. You'll just have to suffer.
